name: manualPaymentWithNegativeAmount

testSteps.description: Given that I'm logged in to Voucher Entry page

children.description: When i open page from sidebar menu: {Accounts Payable,Voucher Entries,Voucher Entry}

testSteps.description: Then the Payment Information form and its contents should show up
When I set the Supplier to '133339'

exception.message:
Expected condition failed: waiting for visibility of all elements located by By.xpath:  .//div[contains(@class, 'form-item')][span[text()='Supplier']]//div[contains(@class, 'Select-option')] | .//div[contains(@class, 'form-item')][span[contains(text(), 'Supplier')]]//div[contains(@class, 'Select-option')] (tried for 120 second(s) with 100 milliseconds interval)

testSteps.description: When I set the 'Invouce Number' to 'LXUQbuyaes'
When I set the Currency to 'USD'
When i click on continue button
When I select the first Bank Account and click 'Submit' button if modal exist
When I set the Gross Amount to '-10000'
When i click on continue button
Then the 'GL Distribution' form and its contents should show up
When I set the Account Number to '91100'
When I set the Line Description to 'Test'
When I set the Amount to '-10000'
When I set the Employee to 'Vitas'
When I set the Cost Center to '1MAN400'
When I set the General Obj to 'AFGHAI'
When I click on the 'Show Next' button
When I set the AOE to 'YAO'
When I set the Line Ref to 'Test123'
When I set the Purchase Order to '12345'
When I set the Units to '10'
When I set the Unit of Measure to '10'
When I click on 'Save' button
Then the voucher entry successfully created modal and its contents should show up
When i click on proceed to payment button
Then that 'Manual Payment' page and its contents should show up
When I set the 'Supplier' to '133339'
When I set the Invoice Number to 'LXUQbuyaes'
When I click on 'Search' button
Then the 'Open Invoices' section and its contents should show up
When I click the checkbox of the first enabled 'Open Invoices' row
When I click the 'Select Cash' button
Then the 'Select Cash Account' modal should show up
When I select the first account from 'Select cash account' modal
When I click the 'Submit' button from modal
Then the payment summary should appear
When I click on 'Proceed' button
Then the 'Manual Payment Successfully Created' modal should show up
When i click on review payment button
Then the payment review search page should show up
When i click on print button of the first document
Then a pop up notification should show up indicating the payment was successfully sent to print
Then the file should be downloaded
Given that I'm logged in to 'Batch Posting' page
When i click on clear button
When i set the batch type to all batches
When I set the Batch Number using the previously generated value
When I click 'Search' button
When I click 'See More' button
Then the batch should contains the previously created documents
Then the currency amount of the first document should be positive value
When i click on the first document row
Then the payment information modal should show up
Then the payment information amount should be negative
When i click on modal close button
When I click 'Post' button
Then the 'Batch Successfully Posted' notification message should show up

title: Manual payment with negative amount
